turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm looking for some help with my latest bill. It seems way higher than it should be.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble with your bill. To help me investigate, can you please provide your account number or the phone number associated with the account?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's 555-123-4567. I'm usually around $100 a month, but this bill is $175. What's going on?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, thank you. Let me pull up your account information. One moment... I see here a charge for additional data usage. Did you recently exceed your monthly data allowance?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Data usage? That's ridiculous! I'm always on Wi-Fi. How much extra data did I supposedly use? And how can I see a breakdown of my data usage myself? I don't trust that your system is accurate, frankly.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your concern. According to our records, you exceeded your data limit by 5GB, resulting in a $75 overage charge. To view a detailed breakdown of your data usage, you can log in to your account on our website or mobile app and navigate to the 'Usage' section. There, you can see which specific activities consumed the most data during this billing cycle. Additionally, I can offer you a temporary 10GB data add-on for this month to prevent further overage charges.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I'll check the website. Thanks for the information, and the offer for the add-on, but I'll hold off for now. Hopefully, I can figure out what caused the spike in usage. Appreciate the help, though!
